introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: JigsawDesigner ("we", "our", or "us") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting it. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our application and website.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We do not collect personal data.
dataCollection.content2: JigsawDesigner is designed to process your files locally on your device. Your designs, images, and projects never leave your device unless you explicitly choose to export or share them.

list.behavior: We do not track your usage behavior.
list.upload: We do not upload your photos such as puzzle images to any server.
list.sell: We do not sell your data to third parties.

analytics.title: App Analytics
analytics.content: We may use Apple's standard opt-in analytics to improve app performance and stability (e.g., crash reports). This data is anonymous and does not identify you personally. You can opt-out of this at any time through your device settings.

contact.title: Contact Us

hero.subtitle: We are here to support your creative journey. Find answers or get in touch with our team.

q1.question: Is JigsawDesigner a one-time purchase?
q1.answer: Yes, JigsawDesigner offers a lifetime license option as well as subscription plans. Check the App Store for the latest pricing.

q2.question: Can I export my designs for commercial use?
q2.answer: Absolutely. All designs created with JigsawDesigner are yours. You can export them as SVG or PDF for manufacturing or commercial printing.

q3.question: Does it support custom die lines?
q3.answer: Yes, you can import custom SVG paths to use as die lines, or use our advanced algorithms to generate unique patterns automatically.

Help.title: Help Center
Help.subtitle: Complete guide to using JigsawDesigner for creating professional jigsaw puzzles.

1.title: Launch JigsawDesigner
1.desc: Open the application on your Mac or iOS device.

2.title: Choose a Tool
2.desc: Select from 8 drawing tools in the toolbar.

3.title: Draw Your Design
3.desc: Create shapes, paths, or import existing SVG files.

4.title: Generate Jigsaw
4.desc: Click "Generate Jigsaw" to create puzzle pieces.

5.title: Export
5.desc: Save your puzzle as SVG for manufacturing or printing.

select.title: Select Tool
select.desc: Select and move shapes on the canvas. Shift+Click for multi-select, Ctrl+Click to drill into groups.

edit.title: Edit Tool
edit.desc: Edit control points of shapes. Adjust shape geometry precisely by dragging points.

pen.title: Pen Tool
pen.desc: Free-form path drawing. Click and drag to create bezier curves and organic shapes.

line.title: Line Tool
line.desc: Draw straight lines. Perfect for geometric designs and precise connections.

rect.title: Rectangle Tool
rect.desc: Draw rectangular shapes. Click and drag from corner to create.

circle.title: Circle Tool
circle.desc: Draw circles and ellipses. Drag from center to set radius.

polygon.title: Polygon Tool
polygon.desc: Draw multi-sided polygons. Click to place each vertex, double-click to finish.

bezier.title: Bezier Tool
bezier.desc: Draw precise Bezier curves with anchor points and control handles.

selection.title: Selection
items: Single Select: Click on any shape
Select All: Press ⌘A to select all shapes
Deep Selection: Ctrl+Click to select child elements in groups

grouping.title: Grouping
items: Group Shapes: Select multiple shapes and press G
Ungroup: Select a group and press ⌘G

editing.title: Editing
items: Copy: Press ⌘C to duplicate selected elements
Delete: Press Delete or Backspace to remove
Transform: Use Inspector panel to adjust position, scale, and rotation

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.desc: JigsawDesigner uses advanced C++ algorithms with OpenCV and Boost libraries to generate high-quality puzzle pieces using Voronoi diagrams and DCEL data structures.

1.title: Draw Boundary
1.desc: Create the outline shape that will be divided into puzzle pieces.

2.title: Configure
2.desc: Set piece count, slot settings, and choose templates.

3.title: Generate
3.desc: Click 'Generate' to run the algorithm and create interlocking pieces.

4.title: Export
4.desc: Export as SVG for manufacturing or printing.

import.title: Import SVG
import.desc: Import existing SVG files to use as puzzle boundaries or design elements.

export.title: Export SVG
export.desc: Export your designs and generated puzzles as standard SVG files.

premium.title: Premium Feature
premium.desc: Premium subscription required for exporting generated jigsaw puzzles. Free users can design and generate, but export is limited.

shapes.title: Shapes aren't appearing
shapes.content: Check that you're in the correct drawing mode. Verify canvas size has space for your shape. Check shape fill/stroke colors aren't transparent.

select.title: Can't select a shape
select.content: Switch to Select Tool (cursor icon). Ensure the shape isn't hidden behind others. Try using Ctrl+Click to drill into groups.

fail.title: Jigsaw generation fails
fail.content: Ensure your boundary shape is a closed path. Reduce piece count for complex shapes. Check that slot templates are valid.

export.title: Export is disabled
export.content: Premium subscription required for exporting generated puzzles. Free tier allows design but limits export functionality.

needHelp.title: Need More Help?
needHelp.desc: Visit our support page or contact us directly for personalized assistance
